description:
PPA Pickleball Tour 2025 is the most advanced pickleball game ever produced!

Whether youâ€™re strategizing how to beat your opponent with an Erne or testing your reflexes in a Firefight against Anna Leigh Waters and Ben Johns, this game has everything you love about the fastest growing sport in the USA!

*Fully PPA licensed.
*Create the ultimate Pickleball Player and level them up earning XP in Career Mode.
*Elevate your Pickleball skills to the next level playing against the top pickleball pros in the world including Ben Johns and Anna Leigh Waters.
*Motion captured player movement for every pro in the game.
*Compete for a Triple Crown in PPA Tour events set in San Clemente or Atlanta in Career Mode.
*Outwit and outplay advanced AI developed from analyzing professional matches.
*Hit Dinks, Drives, Ernes, ATPs, Overhead Smashes, Dink Battles, and Fire Fights!
*Play Singles or Doubles matches in All Modes.
*Dave Fleming and Michelle McMahon commentary offers expert critiques while also complimenting quality shots and strategy.
*The most realistic video game the pickleball world has ever seen!
name: PPA Pickleball Tour 2025
